org.apache.maven.plugin.cxx.utils.release

Interface CxxReleasePhase

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CheckDependencySnapshotsPhase, CopyPomsIntoBranchPhase, CreateBackupPomsPhase, CreateTagNamePhase, CxxAbstractMavenReleasePluginPhase, CxxAbstractReleasePhase, MapVersionsPhase, PreCheckPomPhase, RestoreBackupPomsPhase, RewritePomsForBranchPhase, RewritePomsForDevelopmentPhase, RewritePomsForReleasePhase, ScmBranchPhase, ScmCheckModificationPhase, ScmCommitBranchPhase, ScmCommitDevelopmentPhase, ScmCommitReleasePhase, ScmTagPhase

    public interface CxxReleasePhase
    A phase in the cxx release/branch goal. $FB derived from org.apache.maven.shared.release.phase.ReleasePhase;

      • run

                                           throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException,
                                                  org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoFailureException
        Execute the phase.
        Parameters:
        releaseDescriptor - the configuration to use
        releaseEnvironment - the environmental configuration, such as Maven settings, Maven home, etc.
        reactorProjects - the reactor projects
        Returns:
        the release result
        Throws:
        ReleaseExecutionException - an exception during the execution of the phase
        ReleaseFailureException - a failure during the execution of the phase
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoFailureException
